episodes.name: Chapter 1
episodes.overview: When the newly elected President reneges on a promise, Francis and Claire decide to sever all allegiances and toss the rules out the window.

episodes.name: Chapter 2
episodes.overview: Francis and Doug plan to frame Secretary of State nominee, Michael Kern. Meanwhile, Zoe's popularity at the Washington Herald continues to grow.

episodes.name: Chapter 3
episodes.overview: Francis heads for his hometown to deal with a crisis. Zoe negotiates the politics of being a journalist on the rise. Claire finds herself a new business partner.

episodes.name: Chapter 4
episodes.overview: Francis shakes down the Congressional leadership. Zoe is offered the promotion of White House Correspondent and doesn't know if she should take it or not.

episodes.name: Chapter 5
episodes.overview: A feud starts between Francis and Marty Spinella. Russo goes into depression about the job losses at the shipyards.

episodes.name: Chapter 6
episodes.overview: The strike between Frank and Marty starts to get out of hand. Russo has decided to run for Governor of Pennsylvania.

episodes.name: Chapter 7
episodes.overview: Frank helps Peter get ready for his governor race, but Peter is starting to have second thoughts. Doug tries to help a young hooker in trouble.

episodes.name: Chapter 8
episodes.overview: Frank has a library named after him at his old military school. Peter tries to win back the support of his hometown.

episodes.name: Chapter 9
episodes.overview: Frank tries to do whatever it takes to get the new bill passed in Congress. Russo goes on a bus campaign with the Vice President, but the VP is not making it an easy trip for him. Zoe's relationship with Frank gets a little bumpy.

episodes.name: Chapter 10
episodes.overview: Claire fuels an old flame. Peter wrestles with his demons. Francis crosses the point of no return.

episodes.name: Chapter 11
episodes.overview: Zoe extends her time away from The Hill while Francis tracks down Russo and engages in damage control.

episodes.name: Chapter 12
episodes.overview: The President sends Frank to St. Louis to persuade Raymond Tusk into becoming the new Vice President. Zoe and Janine investigate Peter Russo's death.

episodes.name: Chapter 13
episodes.overview: Frank scrambles to keep his plan on track. Gillian is planning to sue Claire. Zoe, Janine, and Lucas investigate Rachel Posner and her relationship with Peter Russo.

episodes.name: Chapter 14
episodes.overview: The Underwoods tackle two threats that could bring their plans to ruin. Francis grooms his replacement as Whip. Claire goes on the offensive.

episodes.name: Chapter 15
episodes.overview: Amid turmoil in the home, Frank takes office. Foreign relations become entangled as Durant's team bungles a meeting. As foes negotiate to thwart her, Jackie maneuvers to strengthen her position. Lucas acquires new skills in order to pursue his secret investigation.

episodes.name: Chapter 16
episodes.overview: Tension rises between Francis and Raymond Tusk as the situation with China deteriorates. A battle in the Senate pits Francis against the Republicans.

episodes.name: Chapter 17
episodes.overview: A terror scare at the Capitol traps Francis with a resentful Donald Blythe. Claire gives a live interview that rocks the media.

episodes.name: Chapter 18
episodes.overview: Francis back-channels with a Chinese billionaire. Lucas uses extreme measures to expose the Vice President. A shadowy figure joins Team Underwood.

episodes.name: Chapter 19
episodes.overview: Amidst an energy crisis, Francis and Tusk end their shaky alliance. Lucas must make a difficult choice. Stamper grows closer to Rachel.

episodes.name: Chapter 20
episodes.overview: Despite some friction, the Walkers deepen their friendship with the Underwoods. But it's all-out war between Francis and Tusk.

episodes.name: Chapter 21
episodes.overview: The war with Tusk intensifies. Claire influences Tricia Walker politically and domestically. Francis has a show-down with Linda Vasquez.

episodes.name: Chapter 22
episodes.overview: Things get personal when Tusk blindsides the Underwoods with a scandal. Freddy and his BBQ joint get caught up in the mix.

episodes.name: Chapter 23
episodes.overview: With a military stand-off overseas and potential violence at home, Francis wants to finish off Tusk for good. Claire and Jackie Sharp collide.

episodes.name: Chapter 24
episodes.overview: A Special Prosecutor interrogates Francis. Remy Danton tries to keep his options open. Stamper wrestles with his demons.

episodes.name: Chapter 25
episodes.overview: Francis finds himself shut out and Claire makes a difficult sacrifice. Stamper tries to regain control.

episodes.name: Chapter 26
episodes.overview: Francis faces annihilation while the nation is in an uproar. Stamper must tie up loose ends. Claire feels the cost of ruthlessness.

episodes.name: Chapter 27
episodes.overview: A rocky start for the Underwood Presidency. Frank wants to introduce an ambitious jobs program, while Claire sets her sights on the United Nations.

episodes.name: Chapter 28
episodes.overview: Claire's U.N. bid runs into trouble. Frank fights off mutiny with a bold address to the country.

episodes.name: Chapter 29
episodes.overview: The Russian president's state visit becomes a cold war of wills, and some punks heat things up.

episodes.name: Chapter 30
episodes.overview: Claire bypasses Russia at the U.N. Frank tries to outmaneuver a potential challenger and ends up face to face with a higher power.

episodes.name: Chapter 31
episodes.overview: Frank declares war on Congress to jump-start his jobs program. Claire spars with the Russian Ambassador.

episodes.name: Chapter 32
episodes.overview: Frank and Claire travel to Moscow to negotiate the return of an imprisoned U.S. citizen. Claire takes a stand that jeopardizes their plans.

episodes.name: Chapter 33
episodes.overview: The damage is done and the Underwoods must repair it. But deep wounds don't heal fast, and sometimes not at all.

episodes.name: Chapter 34
episodes.overview: A hurricane endangers more than just the entire East Coast and Frank must make a difficult choice.

episodes.name: Chapter 35
episodes.overview: The Jordan Valley erupts in chaos as Frank's campaign is picking up steam. Claire gets disturbing intel and counsels him.

episodes.name: Chapter 36
episodes.overview: Frank needs to deal with Petrov one on one while Claire tries to preserve the peace-keeping mission. Sacrifices must be made.

episodes.name: Chapter 37
episodes.overview: Things turn ugly when Frank, Jackie, and Heather square off during their first debate. Tom joins Claire on the campaign trail.

episodes.name: Chapter 38
episodes.overview: Heather Dunbar goes for the jugular, forcing Claire to confront her worst fears. The rift between Frank and Claire widens.

episodes.name: Chapter 39
episodes.overview: In the midst of the Iowa caucuses, Frank and Claire must confront hard truths about each other.

episodes.name: Chapter 40
episodes.overview: Claire's absence causes problems for Frank on the campaign trail amid rumors of a marital rift. Claire tries to strike out on her own.

episodes.name: Chapter 41
episodes.overview: As Claire begins exploring a campaign of her own, she and Frank engage in backdoor political maneuvering. But this time they're not on the same side.

episodes.name: Chapter 42
episodes.overview: Claire joins Frank as he stumps in South Carolina, but he doesn't trust her. A disastrous scandal blindsides Frank's campaign on primary day.

episodes.name: Chapter 43
episodes.overview: Claire threatens Frank. Frank makes a politically bold move that may provoke Russia. An event at a campaign stop changes everything.

episodes.name: Chapter 44
episodes.overview: Claire advises Donald Blythe on dealing with Petrov. Further investigations of Lucas Goodwin dredges up his accusations against Frank.

episodes.name: Chapter 45
episodes.overview: Claire clashes with the Secretary of State over her involvement in negotiations with Russia. Dunbar must choose between her campaign and her ethics.

episodes.name: Chapter 46
episodes.overview: Frank and Claire adjust to their new reality. The search for Frank's running mate begins. Frank starts a campaign to weaken Conway's strong support.

episodes.name: Chapter 47
episodes.overview: Formidable as ever, both Underwoods have their eyes on the big picture as they manipulate a potential running mate and push the gun bill.

episodes.name: Chapter 48
episodes.overview: At the convention, Frank and his team publicly push for Catherine Durant to be chosen as his running mate, but privately pursue a different agenda.

episodes.name: Chapter 49
episodes.overview: As Frank deals with a new threat to his candidacy, Claire has doubts about their plan. Claire faces a difficult decision concerning her mother.

episodes.name: Chapter 50
episodes.overview: Frank ups the ante on the war on terror to counter Conway's public show of strength. Tom joins Claire on the campaign trail.

episodes.name: Chapter 51
episodes.overview: Frank asks Will to help deal with extremists threatening to murder hostages. Hammerschmidt digs deeper into the allegations against Frank.

episodes.name: Chapter 52
episodes.overview: As the hostage situation continues, Claire secretly negotiates with Yusuf al Ahmadi. Frank confronts Hammerschmidt.

episodes.name: Chapter 53
episodes.overview: As Congress debates investigating Frank, he and Claire attempt to stoke fear of terrorism. Tom Yates continues his stay in the White House.

episodes.name: Chapter 54
episodes.overview: Frank and his team work to leverage support in key states by any means necessary. Claire learns some upsetting news about one of Frank's friends.

episodes.name: Chapter 55
episodes.overview: The day before the election, Conway holds a 24-hour Skype session with voters, while Frank and Claire stump in key states and try to discredit him.

episodes.name: Chapter 56
episodes.overview: With a tight race and low voter turnout on Election Day, things look grim for Frank. But he's still got one more trick up his sleeve.

episodes.name: Chapter 57
episodes.overview: Nine weeks after Election Day, the Underwoods work to consolidate their power. Leann tries to track down a missing Aidan Macallan.

episodes.name: Chapter 58
episodes.overview: In the midst of uncertainty, suspected Russian forces take over an American station in Antarctica. Meanwhile, a damaging news leak could hurt Frank.

episodes.name: Chapter 59
episodes.overview: When a crisis forces White House personnel to take shelter in a bunker, Commerce Department official Jane Davis negotiates through back channels.

episodes.name: Chapter 60
episodes.overview: While Frank attends an elite men's weekend gathering to firm up support, Claire deals with a stranded Russian ship and threats from Petrov.

episodes.name: Chapter 61
episodes.overview: Petrov tries to influence affairs in the U.S. Jane discusses her agenda with Claire. With her job at stake, Leann reaches out to a reporter for help.

episodes.name: Chapter 62
episodes.overview: The Underwoods and their team angle to undermine the revived committee investigating Frank. Hammerschmidt's investigation heats up.

episodes.name: Chapter 63
episodes.overview: As the team tries to control fallout from damaging testimony and leaks, everyone is under suspicion and tensions flare between Frank and Claire.

episodes.name: Chapter 64
episodes.overview: Frank attempts to stop Cathy from testifying. With Hammerschmidt sniffing out the truth, the Underwoods throw someone close to them under the bus.

episodes.name: Chapter 65
episodes.overview: In the wake of a surprising announcement, everything at the White House is shaken up. A decision must be made about whether to go to war.

episodes.name: Chapter 66
episodes.overview: As the first woman president, Claire faces increased scrutiny and threats. Sibling power couple Annette and Bill Shepherd attempt to influence policy.

episodes.name: Chapter 67
episodes.overview: Claire clashes with the Shepherds and Mark Usher, who pressure her to sign the Future Act. Doug makes an unexpected move.

episodes.name: Chapter 68
episodes.overview: The Shepherds push Claire on a Supreme Court nomination. Doug works to find a new path for himself. Claire consults with Jane on Syria.

episodes.name: Chapter 69
episodes.overview: As a crisis mounts in Syria, Russian President Viktor Petrov wants to make a deal with Claire. Questions arise about Tom Yates's whereabouts.

episodes.name: Chapter 70
episodes.overview: Claire allows her enemies to think she's incapacitated as they plot to remove her from office. Doug's investigation leads him to uncover a secret.

episodes.name: Chapter 71
episodes.overview: Claire makes staff changes. The Shepherds try to recruit Doug to their side. With Mark facing intense scrutiny, Jane offers advice.

episodes.name: Chapter 72
episodes.overview: While the Shepherd family attempts to diminish Claire's power, Doug goes off the grid but continues angling to advance his agenda.

episodes.name: Chapter 73
episodes.overview: Claire tries to tarnish Frank's legacy. Doug provokes Claire by releasing excerpts from Frank's diary. A rift develops between the Shepherds.
